game.name: No.BreakBrick
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Break the bricks and clear your view! This game is a casual game where players break bricks with small balls to penetrate the defense of a beautiful girl and open her heart.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Break the bricks and clear your view! This game is a casual game where players break bricks with small balls to penetrate the defense of a beautiful girl and open her heart.

reviewHighlights.text: What do you expect for something under a dollar? My only complaint is that the art seems AI-generated. Lot of wonkiness going on. On principle, I can'...
